field_5eb411b63e439.name: bottom_padding
field_5eb411b63e439.label: Bottom Padding
field_5eb411b63e439.instructions: Keep this box checked if you want white space below this block.

field_6018a48c114f2.name: is_manual
field_6018a48c114f2.label: Content
field_6018a48c114f2.instructions:
“Auto” builds this from a selected page/post.
“Manual” allows you to pick this button’s elements.

title: Footer Settings
description: Set values for the site's footer.

field_5e9dcdbcdadb2.name: footer_logo
field_5e9dcdbcdadb2.label: Footer Logo (Optional)
field_5e9dcdbcdadb2.instructions: Select a logo to display in the footer. If a logo is not selected, the site's name will be shown instead.

field_5ea06b34321fe.name: footer_button
field_5ea06b34321fe.label: Footer Button (Optional)
field_5ea06b34321fe.instructions: "Link Text" will be shown in this button below site branding in the footer.

field_5eb1b57b46bad.name: address_format
field_5eb1b57b46bad.label: Address Format (Optional)
field_5eb1b57b46bad.instructions: Please enter how you'd like your address to be displayed here.

field_5e98a4b7ffaa5.name: quick_links
field_5e98a4b7ffaa5.label: Quick Links
field_5e98a4b7ffaa5.instructions: Set links for the Quick Links section in the footer. *Max: 8

title: Header Settings
description: Set values for the site’s header.

field_5eb02a7172dd6.name: favicon
field_5eb02a7172dd6.label: Favicon
field_5eb02a7172dd6.instructions: Insert a PNG here to be used as the site’s favicon.

field_5fe0a3144d5ac.name: has_ctas
field_5fe0a3144d5ac.label: Show CTAs?
field_5fe0a3144d5ac.instructions: Toggle calls to action in the site’s header.

field_5fe0a24f4d5aa.name: cta_buttons
field_5fe0a24f4d5aa.label: CTA Buttons
field_5fe0a24f4d5aa.instructions: These calls to action appear on the right side of the site’s header.

title: Hero
description: Set the values for the hero section (just below the header at the top of the homepage).

field_5e98af666596c.name: hero_is_video
field_5e98af666596c.label: Hero Type
field_5e98af666596c.instructions: Is the hero section a video or an image slider?

field_5e98af666cbc7.name: hero_overlay
field_5e98af666cbc7.label: Hero Overlay
field_5e98af666cbc7.instructions: Select the level of overlay for the hero section.

field_5e98af6665a50.name: hero_video
field_5e98af6665a50.label: Hero Video
field_5e98af6665a50.instructions: Set the values for the hero video here.

field_5e98af666267b.name: hero_slides
field_5e98af666267b.label: Hero Slides
field_5e98af666267b.instructions: Set the values for the hero slider here. *Min: 1, Max: 4

field_5e7cae336b5e8.name: is_video
field_5e7cae336b5e8.label: Hero Type
field_5e7cae336b5e8.instructions: This section is shown at the top of the Homepage.

field_5f5a27feacd8c.name: featured_buttons
field_5f5a27feacd8c.label: Featured Buttons
field_5f5a27feacd8c.instructions:
These buttons will display just below the Hero.
*Min: 2, Max: 4

field_5feb2398b0f60.name: links
field_5feb2398b0f60.label: Links (Optional)
field_5feb2398b0f60.instructions: These links—if any—appear at the bottom of this banner. *Max: 2

field_5fe9feffb56e5.label: Mass Times
field_5fe9feffb56e5.message: Mass Times will show in this Banner. Mass Times can be edited in Theme Settings > Mass Times & Schedule.

field_5f5a4cc4acd97.name: news_title
field_5f5a4cc4acd97.label: Title
field_5f5a4cc4acd97.instructions: Do NOT write this in ALL CAPITALS.

field_5f5a4cf2acd98.name: news_button
field_5f5a4cf2acd98.label: Button (Optional)
field_5f5a4cf2acd98.instructions: "Link Text" will be displayed in the button (do NOT write in ALL CAPITALS).

field_5fda7dc7ae143.label: Mass Times
field_5fda7dc7ae143.message: Mass Times will show using this template (Mass Times). Mass Times can be edited in Theme Settings > Mass Times & Schedule.

title: Masses
description: Set the values for the mass times section on the homepage.

field_5e98cbac62d31.name: masses_title
field_5e98cbac62d31.label: Title
field_5e98cbac62d31.instructions: This title will be shown at the top of the mass times section.

field_5e98cbac62d64.name: masses_subtitle
field_5e98cbac62d64.label: Subtitle
field_5e98cbac62d64.instructions: This subtitle will be shown at the top of the mass times section, under the title.

field_5e99eaf5f52dd.label: Mass Times
field_5e99eaf5f52dd.message: Mass Times are set in Theme Settings > Theme Settings.

field_5e98d76b34986.name: masses_buttons
field_5e98d76b34986.label: Buttons (Optional)
field_5e98d76b34986.instructions: Add up to 2 buttons that can be displayed at the bottom of the mass times section.

title: News
description: Set the values for the news section on the homepage.

field_5e98bd905507a.name: news_title
field_5e98bd905507a.label: Title
field_5e98bd905507a.instructions: This title will be shown at the top of the news section.

field_5e98c32a3d0b4.name: news_subtitle
field_5e98c32a3d0b4.label: Subtitle
field_5e98c32a3d0b4.instructions: This subtitle will be shown at the top of the news section, below the title.

field_5e98b7cea6270.name: news_category
field_5e98b7cea6270.label: Category
field_5e98b7cea6270.instructions: Select a category of posts to display in the news section.

field_5e98bda65507b.name: news_link
field_5e98bda65507b.label: Link (Optional)
field_5e98bda65507b.instructions: "Link Text" will be shown in the link above the news posts.

title: Staff
description: Information for the Staff Custom Post Type

field_5eebcb9bcfdbc.name: has_link
field_5eebcb9bcfdbc.label: Has Link?
field_5eebcb9bcfdbc.instructions: Leave this unchecked unless you have a custom contact link.

field_5eebcbe3cfdbd.name: link
field_5eebcbe3cfdbd.label: Link
field_5eebcbe3cfdbd.instructions: Custom link to contact staff member

field_5ebc8a17ddfdf.name: font_faces
field_5ebc8a17ddfdf.label: Font Faces
field_5ebc8a17ddfdf.instructions: Define Font Faces to use custom fonts

field_5eb1cb235547e.name: gtranslate
field_5eb1cb235547e.label: GTranslate
field_5eb1cb235547e.instructions: Check this box if GTranslate is configured, and you wish to include it in the footer.

field_5dd44942f7f9d.name: tweaks
field_5dd44942f7f9d.label: Tweaks
field_5dd44942f7f9d.instructions: Add custom CSS to be applied to the site.

field_5ee7cd42d21dc.label: Other
field_5ee7cd42d21dc.instructions: This is currently just a placeholder.

field_5fbc80882e691.name: has_custom_excerpts
field_5fbc80882e691.label: Custom Excerpts?
field_5fbc80882e691.instructions: This is NOT recommended without additional training.

title: Theme Settings
description: Set values to be used throughout the site, including the church's information & schedule.

field_5db8a028c8c3d.name: address
field_5db8a028c8c3d.label: Address
field_5db8a028c8c3d.instructions: Put the URL from Google Maps in "URL" and how the Address should be displayed in "Link Text."

field_5dc9bed40c3f5.name: iframe
field_5dc9bed40c3f5.label: Iframe
field_5dc9bed40c3f5.instructions: Paste contents of src from the iframe in "Embed a Map" on Google Maps.

field_5db9dfeeb7b82.name: schedule
field_5db9dfeeb7b82.label: Schedule
field_5db9dfeeb7b82.instructions: Up to 3 Sections can be displayed on the Homepage.

field_5e7a23db26383.name: schedule_link
field_5e7a23db26383.label: Schedule Link
field_5e7a23db26383.instructions: "Link Text" will be shown in the link above the Mass Times on the homepage.

field_601962b11a86f.name: staff_image_alignment
field_601962b11a86f.label: Image Alignment
field_601962b11a86f.instructions: Select the vertical alignment for staff images.

field_603d5b29890c8.name: view_all_staff
field_603d5b29890c8.label: View All Button
field_603d5b29890c8.instructions: If using a custom Staff Archive, add the link here. Otherwise, please leave this blank.

field_5e98a518ffaa8.name: social_media
field_5e98a518ffaa8.label: Social Media
field_5e98a518ffaa8.instructions: Set values for social media accounts. *Max: 8
